name: Homebound (itch) (NianZo)
description:
Homebound

You set out on adventures to explore the world. It feels like you've seen all there is to see. But now, maybe it's time to visit home. It's been so long, you're not even sure you know how to get home.

With your platforming skills, clever use of upgrades you find along the way, and advice from people you meet, you are sure to find your way home in the end!

Controls

Mouse & Keyboard only

Move / JumpWASDCrouchLeft ShiftProgress TextSpaceOpen MenuEscape About the Project

Homebound was developed by Nicholas Angle and is built on the Unity engine featuring all custom graphics. Homebound also features excerpts from Homeward by Edvard Grieg which was arranged and recorded for use in Homebound by Kelly Angle.
